title: MDL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 200 Apprentice Posts
description: Mazagon Dock (MDL) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 200 Apprentice Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the MDL Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply onlin...
